NOTE: Net income for the quarter and six months ended November 30, 1996 included a charge of approximately $6.6 million for merger costs associated with the acquisition of OnStream Networks, Inc. (OnStream). Excluding this charge, proforma net income was $112.2 million ($.60 per share) and $203.7 million ($1.10 per share) for the quarter and six months ended November 30, 1996, respectively. Net income for the quarter and six months ended November 30, 1995 included a charge of approximately $69.0 million for merger costs associated with the acquisition of Chipcom Corporation (Chipcom). Excluding this charge, proforma net income was $65.6 million ($.37 per share) and $123.0 ($.70 per share) for the quarter and six months ended November 30, 1995, respectively.
